package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.lsfileax;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractJavaToHostEsbTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileae.Dfhcommarea;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileae.bind.DfhcommareaTransformers;

/**
 * LegStar/Mule Operation Dfhcommarea to Host Byte Array Transformer.
 * 
 * <code>DfhcommareaToHostByteArray</code> takes a Dfhcommarea object as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC) ready
 * to transport to a destination Mainframe.
 * 
 * This class was generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class DfhcommareaToHostByteArray extends AbstractJavaToHostEsbTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a Dfhcommarea object and result
     * will be a byte array.
     */
    public DfhcommareaToHostByteArray() {
        super(new DfhcommareaTransformers());
        registerSourceType(Dfhcommarea.class);
    }


}
